Package fr.zinraphil.models.geometry.angle

Class Angle

java.lang.Object
fr.zinraphil.models.geometry.angle.Angle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Angle>
public class Angle extends Object implements Comparable<Angle>
A class representing an angle. Implementing Comparable, it can be used in a TreeSet.
